name: Buttons Trail
description:
Buttons Trail

A Puzzle Game Where The Floor Falls Behind You
While You Try To Press All Of The Buttons On The Map!

Buttons Can Be Turned On And Off
And All Buttons Have To Be On For You To Advance To The Next Level!


W or Up Arrow = Up
S or Down Arrow = Down
A or Left Arrow = Left
D or Right Arrow = Right

There Are 4 Types Of Floors
1. Normal Floor - Falls After You Walk Off Of It.
2.  Double Floor - Falls After You Walk Off Of It Twice.
3. Solid Floor - Its Just Like Normal Floor But It Doesn't Fall. 
4. Button Floor - That's Your Goal, You Want All Of Them To Be On!

Have Fun!
